document.full_text: hundreds of followers of anti-american cleric moqtada al-sadr took to the streets of baghdad on saturday, trampling u.s. flags and vowing to escalate military resistance if u.s. troops fail to leave iraq this year.
document.title: iraqi cleric's followers demand u.s. troops leave
lines_and_colors: hundreds of followers of anti-american cleric moqtada al-sadr took to the streets of baghdad on saturday, trampling u.s. flags and vowing to escalate military resistance if u.s. troops fail to leave iraq this year.
